entry.title: 2022年高海拔水力发电的应用前景展望 | 2022' Application Prospect of High-Altitude Hydroelectricity
entry.content:
日期 / DATE: 18/02/2022 - 20/02/2022

方式 / METHOD: 线下和线上 / Offline & Online

地址 / LOCATION: 中国宜昌及全球 / Yichang of China & ALL

背景 / BACKGROUND

当前水力发电站需要修筑大型的工程，不但只能对流经的水体进行一次性利用发电，而且会造成对鱼类回游和生态环境的影响。除了能削峰填谷、改善河道，水电站还能为促进人文交流和生态文明做什么贡献呢？

At present, hydroelectric power station needs large-scale construction, which can only be used once for electric power generation by the water flowing through, but will also have impacts on fish migration and ecological environment. In addition to peak shaving and valley filling, and improving river channels. What else can hydropower stations contribute to promoting people-to-people exchanges and ecological civilization?

取自江河湖泊和地下的生活用水通过人工修建或天然的露天引水渠，由自来水厂经过处理后通过配水泵站输送到千家万户，但水流暴露在环境中容易受污染。

The domestic water from rivers, lakes and underground is transported to thousands of households through artificially built or natural open-air diversion channels, treated by the waterworks and through the distribution pump station, but the water flow is easily polluted when exposed to the environment.

然而水力发电、引水渠、自来水系统，是相互独立的系统：引水渠本身无法发电；自来水厂将上游水体进行消毒处理，生活和生产处理过的污水再排入下游江河湖海；下游的自来水厂还要再次对上游的来水重复进行处理。

However, hydroelectric generation, diversion canal and tap-water system are independent systems: the diversion canal itself cannot generate electricity; The water plant disinfects the upstream water, and then discharges the domestic and production sewage into the downstream; Again the downstream waterworks have to disinfect the upstream sewage repeatedly.

这种模式大大浪费了天然能源，增加了对化工的需求和消耗，造成了不可持续的污染和资源浪费型循环。
而氢气等难溶于水的清洁能源气体，在常温常压下有储存与运输成本过高等问题。

This model greatly wastes natural energy, increases the demand and consumption of chemical industry, and causes unsustainable pollution and resource waste cycle.
Hydrogen and other clean energy gases that are difficult to dissolve in water have the problem of high storage and transportation costs at normal temperature and pressure.

概述 / OVERVIEW

本次研讨会将就高海拔水电的开发前景，以及对物流交通、人文交流，和生态环境的促进举行探讨，包括就 中国亚东-孟加拉古里格拉姆、尼泊尔马兰奇-印度皮姆讷格尔 输水发电管及负压气垫超级高铁项目进行热点讨论，对 中国宜昌葛洲坝-清江 、中国湖北恩施-宜昌、尼泊尔马兰奇-加德满都 项目进行详细了解，特别地还将对 埃及苏伊士铁路运河项目 计划进行前期沟通。

The symposium will talk over the development prospect of high-altitude hydroelectricity, as well as the promotion on transportation & logistics, cultural exchanges and ecological environment, including hot discussions on the YaDong of China - Kurigram of Bangladesh and Melamchi of Neapl - Bhimnagar of India Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation & Negative Pressure Air Cushion Hyperloop projects, and learn more about the GeZhouBa - QingJiang of YiChang China , EnShi - YiChang of HuBei China and Melamchi - Kathmandu of Nepal projects, especially the preliminary negotiation and discussion on the plan of Suez Railway Canal Project in Egypt .

这些项目将切实可行地改善当地的贫困状况，有效地促进包括佛教、印度教和伊斯兰教在内的宗教交流与团结，以及增进世界对人类共同未来的理解。

These projects will realistically improve the local poverty situation, effectively promote religious exchanges and unity, including Buddhism, Hinduism and Islam, and enhance the world’s understanding of the common future of mankind.

研讨会还将就 输送管发电系统、负压气垫超级高铁系统，和 基于风洞的助力系统 技术在工程上的实际应用进行现场考察和网络直播。

The symposium will also conduct on-site investigation and webcast on the practical application of Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation System, Negative Pressure Air Cushion Hyperloop System and Wind Tunnel Based Power Accelerated System technologies in engineering.

entry.title: 葛洲坝-清江 输水发电管及超级高铁 | GeZhouBa - QingJiang PHG & NPACH
entry.content:
中国宜昌，输水发电管及负压气垫超级高铁项目

of Yichang China, Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation & Negative Pressure Air Cushion Hyperloop Project

项目概述 / PROJECT OVERVIEW

本项目是恩施-宜昌 输水发电管及超级高铁的姊妹项目，采用输送管发电系统、负压气垫超级高铁系统和基于风洞的助力系统等专利技术。

输水发电管取水口拟位于宜昌市夷陵区黄柏河上的寨其沟水库，管线沿着黄柏河和长江边的沿江大道顺流而下，末端位于宜昌市枝江善溪冲水库长江口，全长约71公里。

This project is the sister project of EnShi - YiChang PHG & NPACH, utilizes the patented technologies of Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation System, Negative Pressure Air Cushion Hyperloop System and Wind Tunnel Based Power Accelerated System etc.

The water intake of Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation is drafted to be located in ZhaiQiGou Reservoir on the HuangBaiHe River in YiLing District of Yichang City. The pipeline flows downstream along the HuangBaiHe River and YanJiang Avenue beside the Yangtze River, and the end is located at the estuary of ShanXiChong Reservoir in ZhiJiang District of YiChang City nearby the Yangtze River, with total length of about 71 kilometers.

寨其沟水库海拔高度116米，此处取水对葛洲坝水电站不会产生直接影响。

The altitude of ZhaiQiGou Reservoir is 116 meters, and the water intake here will not have direct impact on GeZhouBa Hydropower Station.

输水发电管线沿着长江左岸边坡越过葛洲坝，穿过葛洲坝公园后至沿江大道。

The hydroelectric generation pipeline crosses GeZhouBa Dam along the left bank slope of the Yangtze River, passes through GeZhouBa Park and then reaches YanJiang Avenue.

管线末端的长江海拔高程约36米。超级高速终点位于曹岗路与松岗路交汇处，毗陵318国道和紫云铁路枝江沙湾段，与恩施-宜昌 输水发电管及超级高铁相联，对岸就是清江入长江口。

The altitude at the end of the pipeline is about 36 meters. The Hyperloop terminal is located at the intersection of CaoGang Road and SongGang Road, adjoin the National Highway 318 and ZhiJiang ShaWan section of ZiYun Railway, then connected to the EnShi - YiChang PHG & NPACH and its opposite bank is the estuary of Qingjiang River to Yangtze River.

entry.title: 苏伊士铁路运河 | Suez Railway Canal
entry.content:
埃及，基于并行轨道的铁路运河项目

of Egypt, Railway Canal System by Parallel Tracks Project

项目概述 / PROJECT OVERVIEW

本项目采用基于并行轨道的铁路运河系统等专利技术。

轨道线路沿苏伊士运河西奈河岸，以取得较为平坦的道路，减少施工量，个别地点地势起伏略高，平均海拔高度8米，全长约155公里。

This project utilizes the patented technologies of Railway Canal System by Parallel Tracks System etc.

The tracks line will along the Sinai bank of Suez Canal to obtain a relatively flat road and reduce the construction works. The terrain of individual sites is slightly higher, with average altitude of 8 meters and total length of about 155 km.

起点和终点均没有障碍物。

There are no obstacles at the beginning and end.

适合修建大型港口和集装箱货轮升降船坞。

It is suitable for building large ports and container ship lifting docks.

entry.title: 怒江-尼罗河 输水发电管及超级高铁 | NuJiang - Nile PHG & NPACH
entry.content:
中国、缅甸、泰国、孟加拉、印度、巴基斯坦、伊朗、阿联酋、阿曼、也门、吉布提、沙特和埃及等，输水发电管及负压气垫超级高铁项目

of China, Myanmar, Thailand, Bangladesh, India, Pakistan, Iran, UAE, Oman, Yemen, Djibouti, Saudi Arabia and Egypt etc, Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation & Negative Pressure Air Cushion Hyperloop Project

项目概述 / PROJECT OVERVIEW

本项目采用输送管发电系统、负压气垫超级高铁系统、基于风洞的助力系统，以及桥港一体化系统等专利技术。

输水发电管线将始于怒江中国云南段，终点位于尼罗河埃及段，含南亚-尼罗河段和怒江段，全长约13960公里；其中，南亚-尼罗河段沿南亚大陆板块海岸线向西，长约12635公里。

This project utilizes the patented technologies of Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation System, Negative Pressure Air Cushion Hyperloop System, Wind Tunnel Based Power Accelerated System and Bridge & Port for Container Integrated System etc.

The hydroelectric generation pipeline will start from the NuJiang River in YunNan of China and end at the Nile River in Egypt, including the South Asia-Nile Section and the NuJiang River Section, with total length of about 13960 km; the South Asia-Nile Section runs westward along the coastline of the South Asia continental plate, with length of about 12635 km.

输水发电管起点拟于中缅边境上游4.7公里处的怒江上；江中天然分水岭的上游侧保留天然水道，尽量减小对周边环境的影响，取水口位于分水岭下游侧，海拔高度约570米，管线沿怒江顺流而下；

The starting point of the Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation is drafted to be on the NuJiang River 4.7 kilometers upstream of the China-Myanmar border; It is plan to retain the natural waterway on the upstream side of the natural watershed in the river to minimize the impact on the surrounding environment. The water intake is located on the downstream side of the watershed, with altitude of about 570 meters. The pipeline flows down the NuJiang River;

管线怒江段途径缅甸与泰国边境，缅泰共有长度约为231公里，怒江段总长约1325公里；

The NuJiang River Section of the pipeline will pass through Myanmar and the Myanmar-Thailand border, the shared pipeline length on the Myanmar-Thailand border is about 231km, and the total length of NuJiang River Section is about 1325km;

管线怒江段末端位于怒江出海口；

The pipeline end of NuJiang River Section is located at the estuary of NuJiang River;

南亚-尼罗河管线与怒江段相接后，横跨霍尔木兹海峡的长度约57公里，拟定修建桥港一体的跨海大桥和隧道；

After the South Asia-Nile pipeline is connected with the NuJiang River Section, it crosses the Hormuz Strait for about 57 kilometers. It is planned to build a sea crossing bridge and port integrated tunnel;

南亚-尼罗河管线途径迪拜和阿布扎比附近区域后，向南到达靠近亚丁湾的低海拔海岸沿线；

After the South Asia-Nile pipeline passes through the areas near Dubai and Abu Dhabi, it goes south to the low-altitude coast near the Gulf of Aden;

南亚-尼罗河管线绕过曼德海峡，沿红海东岸线低海拔线路再向北；

The South Asia-Nile pipeline bypasses the Bab al-Mandab Strait, and then goes north along the low-altitude line on the east coast of the Red Sea;

在曼德海峡上修建一座桥港一体的跨海大桥和隧道，连通到红海西岸贝雷索的支线，支线长度约228公里，其中跨海大桥长约30公里；

It will build a sea crossing bridge and port integrated tunnel on Bab al-Mandab Strait, to connect to Beraisole at the end of the branch line on the West Bank of the Red Sea. The length of the branch line is about 228km, of which the sea crossing bridge is about 30km long;

红海东岸的南亚-尼罗河管线将跨过亚喀巴湾和苏伊士湾，沿苏伊士湾西岸低海拔线路向北；

The South Asia-Nile pipeline on the East Bank of the Red Sea will cross Aqaba Gulf and Khalij as-Suways, and go north along the low-altitude line on the West Bank of Khalij as-Suways;

南亚-尼罗河管线通过蒂朗岛跨越亚喀巴湾的大桥长约7.2公里和5.8公里，拟定修建桥港一体的跨海大桥和隧道；

The bridges of South Asia-Nile pipeline crossing Aqaba Gulf through Tiran island is about 7.2km and 5.8km long. It is drafted to build a sea crossing bridge and port integrated tunnel;

南亚-尼罗河管线跨越苏伊士湾的大桥主桥长约4.8公里和14.5公里，拟定修建桥港一体的跨海大桥和隧道；

The main bridges of the South Asia-Nile pipeline crossing the Khalij as-Suways is about 4.8km and 14.5km long. It is planned to build a sea crossing bridge and port integrated tunnel;

沿苏伊士湾西岸的南亚-尼罗河管线到达苏伊士后，向西绕到新开罗和开罗上游地区（以便市政水网利用末端管道的水势能），最终汇入尼罗河。

After arriving in Suez along the South Asia-Nile pipeline on the West Bank of the Khalij as-Suways, it winds westward to the upper reaches of New Cairo and Cairo ( It is convenient for the Municipal Pipe Network to use the water potential energy of the end pipeline ) and finally flows into the Nile.

entry.title: 亚东-古里格拉姆 输水发电管及超级高铁 | YaDong - Kurigram PHG & NPACH
entry.content:
中国、不丹、印度、孟加拉，输水发电管及负压气垫超级高铁项目

of China, Bhutan, India and Bangladesh, Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation & Negative Pressure Air Cushion Hyperloop Project

项目概述 / PROJECT OVERVIEW

本项目采用输送管发电系统、负压气垫超级高铁系统和基于风洞的助力系统等专利技术。

超级高铁起点拟于中国西藏亚东县，途径不丹、印度，终点在孟加拉古里格拉姆县境内，输水发电管全长约244公里。

This project utilizes the patented technologies of Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation System, Negative Pressure Air Cushion Hyperloop System and Wind Tunnel Based Power Accelerated System etc.

The Hyperloop will start from Yadong County of Tibet China, pass through Bhutan and India, and end in Kurigram District of Bangladesh. The total length of water transmission and hydroelectric generation pipeline is about 244km.

拟在多加咔山下建设一个矮坝，作为输水发电管的取水口，海拔高程约2820米。

It is drafted to build a low dam at the foot of DuoJiaKa mountain as the water intake of water transmission and Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation, with an altitude of about 2820 meters.

多加咔坡地外观长约809米、宽357米，与河谷路线长约896米，拟采用基于风洞的助力系统专利技术，在坡地上的山体内建设一个风洞作为短起降跑道机场，机场与山谷中的交通线采用负压气垫超级高铁系统相联。

The appearance of DuoJiaKa slope is about 809m long and 357m wide, and the length of the valley route is about 896m. It is drafted to adopt the patented technology of Wind Tunnel Based Power Accelerated System to build a wind tunnel in the mountain on the slope as a short takeoff and landing runway airport, which is connected with the traffic line in the valley through Negative Pressure Air Cushion Hyperloop System.

管线途径中国西藏康布麻曲、不丹阿莫曲、印度托尔萨河，和孟加拉杜德库马河，末端位于与贾木纳河交汇处，海拔高度约为25米。

The pipeline will pass through KanBuMaQu Chhu in Tibet China, Amo Chhu in Bhutan, Torsa River in India and Dud Kumar River in Bangladesh. The end will locate at the intersection with Jamuna River, with altitude of about 25 meters.

entry.title: 恩施-宜昌 输水发电管及超级高铁 | EnShi - YiChang PHG & NPACH
entry.content:
中国湖北，输水发电管及负压气垫超级高铁项目

of Hubei China, Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation & Negative Pressure Air Cushion Hyperloop Project

项目概述 / PROJECT OVERVIEW

本项目是葛洲坝-清江 输水发电管及超级高铁的姊妹项目，采用输送管发电系统、负压气垫超级高铁系统和基于风洞的助力系统等专利技术。

起点拟位于湖北恩施市，终点在湖北宜昌市枝江，沿清江顺流而下，全长约255公里，在宜万铁路恩施段的南部。

This project is the sister project of GeZhouBa - QingJiang PHG & NPACH, utilizes the patented technologies of Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation System, Negative Pressure Air Cushion Hyperloop System and Wind Tunnel Based Power Accelerated System etc.

It will start from EnShi of HuBei Province and end at ZhiJiang District of Yichang City, HuBei Province. It flows down the QingJiang River, with total length of about 255 km, at the south of EnShi section of YiChang-WanZhou Railway.

输水发电管取水口拟位于清江姚家坪水电站的上游侧，海拔高程约630米。

The water intake of Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation is drafted to be located at the upstream of YaoJiaPing Hydropower Station of QingJiang River, with altitude of about 630 meters.

姚家坪水电站位于恩施市东北方向38公里处，清江流经恩施市区。

YaoJiaPing Hydropower Station is located 38 kilometers northeast of EnShi City, and the QingJiang River flows through the Enshi City.

管线拟穿过清江水布垭水电站的山体。（ 部分管线，比如观光支线，可能位于水底，与宜万铁路类似？）

The pipeline is drafted to pass through the mountains of QingJiang ShuiBuYa Hydropower Station. ( Some parts of the pipeline, such as sightseeing branch line may be underwater, similar to YiChang-WanZhou Railway? )

直接从隔河岩水库到达高坝洲下游，而不绕经隔河岩水电站和高坝洲水电站之间的流域。

It runs directly from GehHeYan Reservoir to the lower reaches of GaoBaZhou without bypassing the watershed between GehHeYan Hydropower Station and GaoBaZhou Hydropower Station.

末端跨越长江，与葛洲坝-清江 输水发电管及超级高铁项目相连。

The end crosses the Yangtze River and is connected with the GeZhouBa - QingJiang PHG & NPACH project.

entry.title: 马兰奇-加德满都 输水发电管及超级高铁 | Melamchi - Kathmandu PHG & NPACH
entry.content:
尼泊尔，输水发电管及负压气垫超级高铁项目

of Nepal, Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation & Negative Pressure Air Cushion Hyperloop Project

项目概述 / PROJECT OVERVIEW

本项目是马兰奇-皮姆讷格尔 输水发电管及超级高铁的姊妹项目，采用输送管发电系统、负压气垫超级高铁系统和基于风洞的助力系统等专利技术。

超级高铁起点拟位于马兰奇，终点在尼泊尔首都加德满都，长约41公里，输水发电管全长约67公里。（含跨越山峰增加的8公里）

This project is the sister project of Melamchi - Bhimnagar PHG & NPACH, utilizes the patented technologies of Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation System, Negative Pressure Air Cushion Hyperloop System and Wind Tunnel Based Power Accelerated System etc.

The Hyperloop will start from Melamchi and end at Kathmandu, the capital of Nepal, with length of about 41 km, and the total length of pipeline for hydroelectric generation is about 67km. (including added 8 kilometers of mountain crossing)

输水发电管取水口拟位于马兰奇主供水点和印德拉瓦提河上游，海拔高程约1900米处。

The water intake of Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation is drafted to be located at upstream of the Melamchi Water Supply Head Poiny and the Indrawati River, with altitude of about 1900 meters.

马兰奇以下5公里的印德拉瓦提河段，为与马兰奇-皮姆讷格尔 输水发电管及超级高铁共用的部分。

There are 5km Indrawati River segment downstream of Melamchi is shared with the Melamchi - Bhimnagar PHG & NPACH.

从印德拉瓦提河到加德满都，有16公里的山峦需要翻越，最高峰海拔高程为1756米。

From Indrawati River to Kathmandu, there are 16 kilometers of mountains to climb, and the altitude of highest peak is 1756 meters .

在加德满都境内，管线从1400米海拔高度，沿着曼纳哈拉河方向顺流而下。

In Kathmandu, the pipeline flows down the Manohara River from altitude of 1400 meters.

管线末端位于海拔高度为1293米的哈奴玛蒂河和曼纳哈拉河的交汇处，毗邻特里布万国际机场。

The end of the pipeline is located at the intersection of the Hanumante River and Manohara River with altitude of 1293 meters, adjacent to the Tribhuvan International Airport.

entry.title: 马兰奇-皮姆讷格尔 输水发电管及超级高铁 | Melamchi - Bhimnagar PHG & NPACH
entry.content:
尼泊尔马兰奇-印度皮姆讷格尔，输水发电管及负压气垫超级高铁项目

Melamchi of Nepal - Bhimnagar of India, Pipeline Hydroelectric Generation & Negative Pressure Air Cushion Hyperloop Project

entry.title: 宜万铁路 | YiChang-WanZhou Railway
entry.content:
253座桥梁和159条隧道 | 253 Bridges and 159 Tunnels

中国宜万铁路工程最终于2010年完工，

一条平行于三峡大坝水库的线路，这条东西长380公里的线路穿过美丽但富有挑战性的山区，从湖北省会武汉和宜昌（三峡大坝所在地）到重庆以东的万州市。

Work was finally completed in 2010 on China’s YiWan Railway,

a route paralleling the lake formed by the Three Gorges dam, a 380 km East-West line running through beautiful but challenging mountainous terrain from Wuhan, the capital of Hubei Province, and Yichang (the site of the Three Gorges Dam), to Wanzhou City, just East of Chongqing.

这条线路最初由孙中山在1903年提出，旨在缩短中国西南部和东部山区之间的铁路运输。

该项目最初开始于1909年，但由于难以克服的技术问题，由于自然环境恶劣，该项目一再被放弃，直到2003年中央政府决定重新启动。

这条铁路是中国最重要的国家运输走廊之一的一部分。

该项目实现了增加走廊容量、消除运输障碍和降低运输成本的主要目标，并且已经为项目区的经济增长和减贫做出了重大贡献，并有可能使整个西部地区受益。

The route was originally proposed by Sun Yat-Sen in 1903 to shorten the rail journey between the mountainous regions in the southwest and eastern parts of China.

The project initially began in 1909, but was repeatedly abandoned from insurmountable technological problems due to the difficult natural environment, until the central government decided to relaunch it in 2003.

This railway is a part of one of China’s most important national transport corridors.

The project achieved its main objectives of increasing corridor capacity, removing transport barriers, and reducing transport costs, and has already contributed significantly to economic growth and poverty reduction in the project area, and potentially benefitting the entire Western area.

中国隧道桥梁博物馆 | China’s Tunnel and Bridge Museum

这条铁路线穿过云贵高原边缘的一段山脉，是中国最困难、最昂贵的铁路线。
花了惊人的七年时间和50000名工人挖掘和钻探了159条隧道，建造了253座桥梁。在一个极端的例子中，沿着这条路线钻一条穿越齐岳山的隧道花了将近六年的时间。
在380公里的铁路总长度中，占75%的280公里由桥梁和隧道组成。
每一公里的铁路都至少有一座桥或一条隧道，通常每座桥或隧道都有一座，导致当地人将铁路称为：“隧道桥梁博物馆”。

This railway line through a stretch of mountains on the edge of the Yunnan-Guizhou Plateau was China’s most difficult and expensive to build.

It took a staggering seven years and 50,000 workers to dig and drill 159 tunnels and build 253 bridges. In one extreme case, it took nearly six years to drill a tunnel through Qiyue Mountain along the route.

Of the railway’s total length of 380 Km, 75% percent or 280 Km, consists of bridges and tunnels.

Each and every kilometer of the railway contains at least one bridge or one tunnel, most often one of each, leading the locals to refer to the railway as the: “tunnel and bridge museum”…

6千万元/公里 | 60 Million RMB per Kilometer

这条铁路经过中国一些最困难的地形，许多路段穿过喀斯特地形，铁路的总设计师声称这是他所从事过的最困难的项目。
该线总投资超过200亿元人民币（28.5亿美元，截止2019年12月），每公里约6000万元，是中国最昂贵的铁路，是第二昂贵的青藏铁路每公里3000万元人民币的两倍。

具有讽刺意味的是，这条铁路的建设需要如此长的时间，以至于铁路技术在其自身建设过程中超过了它。
宜万铁路是为时速约200公里的列车设计的，这是开工时速度最快的，但在施工完成时落后了两代。
考虑到建设困难，在不久的将来，中国可能没有人有兴趣升级这条铁路。
这条铁路将宜昌至万州的旅行时间从22小时缩短到5小时，而从中国中部或东部其他城市到中国西南部的旅行时间也大大缩短，为居住在陡峭偏远的武陵山区的居民带来了新的机会。
一位当地居民说，“以前我们花100元（15美元）去宜昌一天的车程。现在，30元可以在两小时内到达。”

The railway goes through some of the most difficult terrain in the country, with many sections running through karst topography, and the railway’s chief designer claiming this to have been the hardest project he had ever worked on.

The line involved more than 20 billion RMB (2.85 billion US$ - Dec. 2019) in total investment, about 60 million for each kilometer, and is China’s most expensive railway, costing double the 30 million RMB per kilometer for the Qinghai-Tibet Railway which was the second most expensive.

It is a bit of anticlimactic irony that this railway required so much time to build that railway technology surpassed it during its own construction.

The YiChang-WanZhou Railway was designed for trains traveling at about 200 kph, which were the fastest at the time construction began, but was two generations behind by the time construction was completed.

Given the construction difficulties, there is probably no one in China interested in upgrading this railway in the immediate future.

This railway reduced the Yichang-Wanzhou travel time from 22 hours to just five hours, and travel time from other Central or East China cities to Southwest part of the country are now also significantly shorter, bringing new opportunities for residents who live in the steep and remote Wuling mountains.

One local resident said, “We used to pay 100 Yuan (US$15) for a one-day bus trip to Yichang before. Now, 30 Yuan can get us there in two hours.”

基础设施和私有化 | Infrastructure and Privatization

中国在三峡、青海、新疆和西藏等偏远地区投入巨资修建铁路，试图将全国的广袤土地与便捷的交通联系起来。
中国领导人从一开始就认识到，经济发展伴随着运输，因此，保持对运输基础设施的控制源于将发展利益分配给整个国家的决心。
现实情况是，并非所有基础设施都注定在财务上有利可图：盈利能力是西方标准的唯一衡量标准……
私人开发的铁路系统只能在利润最高的线路上建设，这些线路可能会为其所有者积累数十亿美元，但这可能会使全国一半的人在交通方面一贫如洗，并被判处永久贫困。
因此，铁路私有化将使中国中央政府承担建设所有无利可图线路的成本，而不会从盈利部分获益。
这是西方资本主义的主要诅咒之一：利润私有化，亏损社会化……

China has invested heavily in railways in remote areas like the Three Gorges, Qinghai, Xinjiang and Tibet, in an attempt to connect the length and breadth of the country with convenient and fast transportation.

Chinese leaders recognized from the beginning that economic development follows transportation, and thus maintaining control of the transportation infrastructure derives from a determination to distribute the benefits of development to the entire nation.

The reality is that not all infrastructure is destined to be financially profitable: profitability being the only measure by Western standards…

A privately-developed railway system would be built only on the most profitable routes, those likely to amass billions for their owners but that would leave perhaps half the nation destitute for transportation and sentenced to perpetual poverty.

Thus, railway privatization would saddle China’s central government with the costs of building all the unprofitable routes without benefitting from the profitable segments.

This is one of Western capitalism’s main mantras: privatize the profits and socialize the losses…

移动通信也是如此 | Same with mobile communications

中国中央政府认识到快速、廉价的通信带来的发展潜力，颁布法令，全体人民必须平等受益，或者至少有更多平等的机会受益，因此整个国家，包括沙漠和武陵等最困难的山区，人口稀少，没有盈利的现实希望。
但随着中国的通用移动电话系统，一些最偏远山村的农民每天都在上网，学习更好的农业方法，检查和谈判价格，安排销售。
通过这条新铁路，当地农民和商人（私营企业可能会忽视他们）不仅可以轻松安排产品的运送，还可以在区域人口中心之间快速旅行，刺激旅游业和各种商业的巨大增长，从而使整个地区受益……

Recognizing the development potential attributable to rapid and inexpensive communications, China’s central government decreed that the entire population must benefit equally, or at least have more equal opportunity to benefit, and thus the entire country was wired, including the deserts and the most difficult mountainous areas, such as Wuling, with sparse population and no realistic hope of profitability.

But with China’s universal mobile phone system, farmers in some of the most remote mountain villages are on the internet daily, learning better agricultural methods, checking and negotiating prices and arranging sales.

And with this new railway through some of nature’s most formidable barriers, local farmers and business people (who would have been ignored by private enterprise) can not only easily arrange delivery of their produce but quickly travel between regional population centers, stimulating enormous increases in tourism and all manner of commerce, thus benefiting the entire region…
